sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHWEINFURT, a city of the kingdom of Bavaria, in the circle of the Upper Maine, the capital of an extensive bailiwick of the same name. It stands on the river Maine, which protects it on one side, and is defended by fortifications on the other parts. It is not well built, the streets being narrow and crooked. It contains a fine palace, eight churches, 780 houses, and 7100 inhabitants, who are occupied in various small branches of manufactures. Long. 9. 44. E. Lat. 50. 10. N.
